channel.title: Comments for page "Rack on the Rocks"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Rack on the Rocks"

item.title: I don't know whether this should go here or in /storm-menu
item.content:encoded:
I think I once saw a list of how many Racks were needed to increase the amount of Storm Points gained per mission (assuming a base of 8, from Cowl of the Second HoCage & Limitless Focus lv. 2+), but now I couldn't find it for my life :(
Thus, I've calculated it from scratch. Here are the results:

MPH per Mission Juice without S3C1 juice with S3C
9 3 1
10 5 3
11 8 6
12 10 8
13 13 11
14 15 13
15 â€” 16

Enjoy, and profit!

Footnotes
1. +11% Storm Points per mission
